page.title: 05MODEL FARM
page.content: MODEL FARM The Farm is 120 years old with the house being older than the farm.There are 103 acres of barley, wheat, peas and grass.There are 50 beef cattle which are fattened up then sold. Five workers are needed. The farmer has worked for 44 years. He gets up at 7am and works about 9 hours a day.The work is tiring but enjoyable.The first job is to feed the cattle. Cattle are bought and sold at the cattle market. Some have caught T.B. There are always repairs being done on the farm. The barn was once set on fire 20 years ago and some motor bike boys have caused damage in the fields. The workshop was once burgled. Wildlife seen around the farm are foxes, hawks and owls. Rats are a problem.
